statements: SELECT * FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE start_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, start_time FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE end_date > '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE participating_teams LIKE '%Team A%';
SELECT tournament_name, end_date, end_time FROM TournamentSchedule ORDER BY end_date DESC, end_time ASC;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, start_time FROM TournamentSchedule
SELECT * FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE tournament_id = 1
SELECT tournament_name, end_date, end_time FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT tournament_id, participating_teams FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE JSON_LENGTH(participating_teams) > 2
SELECT * FROM TournamentSchedule ORDER BY start_date ASC, start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE team_1 = 'Team A';
SELECT team_1, team_2, date FROM TournamentSchedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM TeamInformation WHERE total_players > 10;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, total_players FROM TeamInformation WHERE team_name LIKE 'Team%';
SELECT * FROM TournamentSchedule WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM TeamInformation WHERE total_players > 20 ORDER BY team_name ASC
SELECT team_name, total_players FROM TeamInformation WHERE coach_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM TeamInformation WHERE total_players < 10 ORDER BY total_players DESC
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM TeamInformation WHERE coach_name LIKE 'M%' AND total_players BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM TeamInformation WHERE total_players > 15 AND coach_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY team_name
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, team_country FROM teams WHERE team_country = 'USA';
SELECT schedule_id, date, time FROM schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE team_country = 'Spain' OR team_country = 'France';
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%FC%';
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE team_id = 1
SELECT schedule_id, date, time, team_id FROM schedule ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT team_name, team_country FROM teams WHERE team_country = 'Spain'
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE winner_id IS NULL
SELECT matches.match_id, teams.team_name AS team1_name, matches.team2_id, teams.team_name AS team2_name FROM matches INNER JOIN teams ON matches.team1_id = teams.team_id
SELECT * FROM tournament_schedule ORDER BY date ASC, start_time ASC, end_time ASC
SELECT team_name, country, coach FROM teams WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT team_id1, team_id2, venue FROM matches WHERE schedule_id = 1
SELECT schedule_id, date, start_time, end_time, team_id FROM tournament_schedule WHERE start_time >= '12:00:00'
SELECT match_id, winning_team_id, losing_team_id, score FROM results WHERE winning_team_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM tournament_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, coach, country FROM teams WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT team_id1, team_id2, venue FROM matches WHERE venue = 'Stadium A';
SELECT result_id, winning_team_id, losing_team_id FROM results WHERE match_id = 5;
SELECT date, start_time, end_time FROM tournament_schedule WHERE team_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM tournament_dates;
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_date FROM tournaments ORDER BY tournament_date DESC;
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_time FROM tournament_times WHERE time_id = 2;
SELECT tournament_name, venue FROM tournaments JOIN schedules ON tournaments.tournament_id = schedules.tournament_id;
SELECT * FROM tournament_dates
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name FROM tournaments
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) FROM teams GROUP BY team_name
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time, venue FROM schedules WHERE venue='Stadium A'
SELECT tournament_name, team_name FROM tournaments JOIN teams ON tournaments.team_id = teams.team_id
